# Staff Engineer - Infrastructure

## About This Role

Join our world-class engineering team as a Staff Engineer focusing on infrastructure and platform reliability.

## Experience Required

- **Minimum 8 years** of professional software engineering experience
- Deep expertise in distributed systems
- Track record of leading technical initiatives

## Technical Requirements

### Must Have
- Kubernetes (K8s) expertise
- Terraform and infrastructure as code
- Python 3 and/or Golang
- AWS (EC2, EKS, S3, RDS)
- CI/CD pipelines

### Nice to Have
- Machine learning infrastructure (MLOps)
- Data pipeline experience (Kafka, Spark)
- Security and compliance knowledge

## What You'll Do

1. Lead technical design for critical infrastructure
2. Mentor engineers across the organization
3. Drive architectural decisions
4. Improve system reliability and performance
